HERO.TITLE: A more trustworthy way to

STATEMENTS.S1: Visibility shouldn't be something you buy.
STATEMENTS.S2: Trust shouldn't reset every time you log in.
STATEMENTS.S3: Good behavior should compound—not get buried.
STATEMENTS.S4: Endless messaging with little signal is exhausting.
STATEMENTS.S5: Money shouldn't override how someone treats you.

CTA.TITLE: Join the
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Gylde isn't about signing up fast. It's about joining a community where trust is earned and quality is protected.

HERO.TITLE: Find Your
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Not casual dating. Not guesswork. A structured space where clarity meets connection and relationships are built with intention.

FEATURES.LABEL: Why Gylde
FEATURES.TITLE: Clarity, Not Guesswork
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Our members join because they want structure around what matters most—lifestyle, ambition, generosity, and intention.

LIFESTYLE.TITLE: Lifestyle Expectations
LIFESTYLE.DESCRIPTION: Be upfront about how you live and what you expect. No ambiguity—just aligned lifestyles from the start.

AMBITION.TITLE: Ambition & Growth
AMBITION.DESCRIPTION: Connect with members who value personal development, career goals, and building toward something greater.

GENEROSITY.TITLE: Generosity & Support
GENEROSITY.DESCRIPTION: A space for those open to giving and receiving support. Clear about intentions, respectful in approach.

INTENTION.TITLE: Built with Intention
INTENTION.DESCRIPTION: Every relationship here starts with purpose. No games, no uncertainty—just genuine, intentional connections.

VERIFIED.TITLE: Verified Members
VERIFIED.DESCRIPTION: Every profile is verified. Know that the person you are connecting with is real, serious, and authentic.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy & Discretion
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Your privacy matters. Share on your terms with robust controls designed for your peace of mind.

STEP_1.TITLE: Define What You Want
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Our structured profile guides you through lifestyle, ambitions, and relationship expectations. No guessing—just clarity.

STEP_2.TITLE: Find Aligned Matches
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: Browse verified members who share your intentions. Filter by what matters: lifestyle, goals, and openness to support.

STEP_3.TITLE: Connect with Purpose
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: Start conversations knowing you are both on the same page. Build relationships grounded in mutual respect and clear intentions.

VALUES.LABEL: Our Promise
VALUES.TITLE: Structure That Works
VALUES.DESCRIPTION: We built Gylde because dating should not require decoding mixed signals. Our platform gives you the structure to be clear about what you want—and find others who want the same.

LIST.CLEAR_EXPECTATIONS: Clear expectations from the first message
LIST.ZERO_TOLERANCE: Zero tolerance for dishonesty or games
LIST.STRUCTURED_PROFILES: Structured profiles that surface what matters
LIST.MUTUAL_RESPECT: A community built on mutual respect

CTA.DESCRIPTION: You define the connection. Join a community built on clarity, intention, and mutual respect.

COMPLETE.TITLE: Welcome to Gylde
COMPLETE.SUBTITLE: Your profile is ready. Start exploring intentional connections.

HERO.TITLE: Dating With
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Gylde isn't just another dating app. We're building a community where clarity, intention, and genuine connection come first.

MISSION.LABEL: Our Mission
MISSION.TITLE: Structure That Empowers
MISSION.P1: Modern dating is exhausting. Endless swiping, mixed signals, and profiles that don't reflect reality. We built Gylde to change that.
MISSION.P2: Our platform provides the structure for meaningful connections—where people are upfront about their intentions, verified to be who they say they are, and supported by tools that make dating feel less like a game and more like a genuine pursuit of partnership.
MISSION.P3: Whether you're looking for companionship, mentorship, or a life partner, Gylde gives you the framework to find it—on your terms.

VALUES.LABEL: Our Values
VALUES.HEADER_DESCRIPTION: These principles guide everything we build and every decision we make.

AUTHENTICITY.TITLE: Authenticity
AUTHENTICITY.DESCRIPTION: We believe real connections start with real people. Our verification systems ensure you're meeting who you expect to meet.

INTENTIONALITY.TITLE: Intentionality
INTENTIONALITY.DESCRIPTION: No games, no guesswork. Gylde is for people who know what they want and aren't afraid to be upfront about it.

SAFETY.TITLE: Safety
SAFETY.DESCRIPTION: Your security is our priority. From identity verification to private messaging, we build safety into every feature.

RESPECT.TITLE: Respect
RESPECT.DESCRIPTION: Every member deserves respect. Our community guidelines ensure a welcoming environment for all.

STORY.LABEL: Our Story
STORY.TITLE: Built by People Who Get It
STORY.P1: Gylde was founded by people who had experienced the frustrations of modern dating firsthand. The endless profiles with no substance. The matches that went nowhere. The uncertainty of not knowing if someone was even who they claimed to be.
STORY.P2: We envisioned a platform where intentions are clear from the start. Where a lifestyle preference isn't something to hide but something to match on. Where verification isn't optional—it's the foundation of trust.
STORY.P3: Today, Gylde serves thousands of members who share our belief that dating should be intentional, respectful, and rewarding. We're not trying to be the biggest dating platform. We're trying to be the most meaningful one.

CARD.TITLE: The Vision
CARD.SUBTITLE: Why We Built Gylde
CARD.DESCRIPTION: We saw a gap in the dating world—platforms that either encouraged superficial swiping or made no effort to verify who was really behind the profile. Gylde was born from the belief that dating should be intentional, transparent, and safe.

IDENTITY_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Identity Verification
IDENTITY_VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Every profile can be verified with government ID, so you know who you're talking to.

AI_ASSISTANCE.TITLE: AI-Powered Assistance
AI_ASSISTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Premium members get AI help crafting messages and perfecting their profiles.

VIRTUAL_PHONE.TITLE: Virtual Phone Numbers
VIRTUAL_PHONE.DESCRIPTION: Share a number without sharing your real one. Privacy meets convenience.

CLEAR_INTENTIONS.TITLE: Clear Intentions
CLEAR_INTENTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Know what someone is looking for before you match. No surprises, no wasted time.

PRIVATE_PHOTOS.TITLE: Private Photo Control
PRIVATE_PHOTOS.DESCRIPTION: Share private photos only with people you choose. You control access.

TRUST_SCORE.TITLE: Trust Score System
TRUST_SCORE.DESCRIPTION: Build credibility over time. Complete your profile, verify your identity, earn trust.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Experience
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Join thousands of members who've chosen clarity over chaos.

S1.DESCRIPTION: Tell us about yourself—your lifestyle, what you're looking for, and what makes you unique. Upload photos that show the real you.

DETAILS.D3: Earn a verification badge on your profile

S4.DESCRIPTION: When you find someone intriguing, reach out. Our messaging features help you connect genuinely and safely.

REPUTATION.TITLE: The Reputation System
REPUTATION.DESCRIPTION: Your reputation tier reflects your engagement and behavior on Gylde. Higher tiers unlock more features and show others you're a quality member.

COMPLETE_PROFILE.DESCRIPTION: Add photos, write a bio, and fill out your preferences

IDENTITY_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Identity Verification
IDENTITY_VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Verify your ID to build reputation faster

QUALITY_CONVERSATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Engage respectfully and respond to messages

CONSISTENT_ACTIVITY.TITLE: Consistent Activity
CONSISTENT_ACTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Stay active to maintain and grow your tier

REPUTATION.CAPTION: Reputation Tiers

Q1.QUESTION: How is Gylde different from other dating apps?
Q1.ANSWER: Gylde is built for intentional connections. We focus on clear communication of relationship goals, robust identity verification, and a reputation system that rewards quality members. No endless swiping—just meaningful matches.

Q2.QUESTION: Is identity verification required?
Q2.ANSWER: Verification is optional but highly encouraged. Verified profiles earn a badge and build reputation faster, making them more likely to receive responses. It's a quick process that takes just a few minutes.

Q3.QUESTION: How does the reputation system work?
Q3.ANSWER: Your reputation tier (New, Active, Established, Trusted, Distinguished) reflects your engagement and behavior on the platform. Higher tiers unlock the ability to start more conversations with higher-tier members each day. Build your reputation by completing your profile, staying active, and being respectful to others.

Q4.QUESTION: What are private photos?
Q4.ANSWER: Private photos are images only visible to people you approve. When someone requests access, you can accept or decline. This gives you control over who sees your more personal content. Private photos are a Premium feature.

Q5.QUESTION: How does the virtual phone number work?
Q5.ANSWER: Premium members get a dedicated virtual phone number. You can share it with matches instead of your real number. Calls and texts are forwarded to you, keeping your actual number private.

Q6.QUESTION: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
Q6.ANSWER: Yes, you can cancel anytime. You'll keep your premium features until the end of your current billing period. No long-term commitments required.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Find Your
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Join Gylde today and experience dating with intention.

HERO.TITLE: Safety Tips
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Meeting new people should be exciting, not stressful. Follow these tips to protect yourself while making meaningful connections.

T1.TITLE: Keep Conversations on Gylde
T1.DESCRIPTION: Use our messaging system until you feel comfortable. It's monitored for safety and gives you easy access to blocking and reporting tools.

T2.TITLE: Look for Verified Profiles
T2.DESCRIPTION: Verified members have confirmed their identity. While not a guarantee of character, it means they are who they claim to be.

T3.TITLE: Take Your Time
T3.DESCRIPTION: Don't rush into sharing personal information or meeting in person. Genuine connections can develop at a comfortable pace.

T4.TITLE: Video Chat First
T4.DESCRIPTION: Before meeting in person, consider a video call. It confirms they look like their photos and helps you gauge chemistry.

T5.TITLE: Meet in Public
T5.DESCRIPTION: For first meetings, choose busy, public places. Coffee shops, restaurants, and popular venues are great options.

T6.TITLE: Tell Someone Your Plans
T6.DESCRIPTION: Let a friend or family member know where you're going, who you're meeting, and when you expect to be back.

RED_FLAGS_SECTION.TITLE: Red Flags to Watch For
RED_FLAGS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Trust your instincts. If something feels off, it probably is. Here are warning signs to look out for:
RED_FLAGS_SECTION.ACTION: If you encounter any of these behaviors, stop communication immediately and report the user through our app.

RED_FLAGS.F1: Asks for money or financial help
RED_FLAGS.F2: Refuses to video chat or meet in public
RED_FLAGS.F3: Gets angry when you set boundaries
RED_FLAGS.F4: Pressures you to share personal information quickly
RED_FLAGS.F5: Has inconsistent stories or profile details
RED_FLAGS.F6: Wants to move off Gylde immediately
RED_FLAGS.F8: Makes you feel uncomfortable or unsafe

MEETING_SECTION.LABEL: First Date Safety
MEETING_SECTION.TITLE: Meeting In Person
MEETING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: When you're ready to take a connection offline, follow these precautions.

C1.TITLE: Choose the Location
C1.DESCRIPTION: Pick a public place you're familiar with—a busy coffee shop, restaurant, or popular venue. Don't let them choose a remote or private location for a first meeting.

C2.TITLE: Arrange Your Own Transportation
C2.DESCRIPTION: Drive yourself or use a rideshare. Don't rely on your date for a ride, especially for the first few meetings. This gives you control over when you leave.

C3.TITLE: Tell a Friend
C3.DESCRIPTION: Share your plans with someone you trust: where you're going, who you're meeting, and when you expect to return. Consider sharing your live location.

C4.TITLE: Stay Sober
C4.DESCRIPTION: Keep your wits about you. Limit alcohol consumption and never leave your drink unattended. Being alert helps you make good decisions.

C5.TITLE: Trust Your Gut
C5.DESCRIPTION: If something feels wrong, leave. You don't owe anyone an explanation. Your safety is more important than being polite.

C6.TITLE: Check In
C6.DESCRIPTION: Set up a check-in system with a friend. A text or call at a predetermined time lets them know you're okay—or signals that you need help.

FINANCIAL_SECTION.TITLE: Protect Your Finances
FINANCIAL_SECTION.STRONG: Never send money to someone you haven't met in person.
FINANCIAL_SECTION.P1_REST: Scammers often build emotional connections before asking for financial help. No matter how compelling the story, don't send money, gift cards, or financial information to anyone on Gylde.
FINANCIAL_SECTION.P2: Common scams include: medical emergencies, travel costs to meet you, business investments, and cryptocurrency schemes. If someone asks for money, report them immediately.

FEATURES_SECTION.LABEL: Built-In Protection
FEATURES_SECTION.TITLE: Gylde Safety Features
FEATURES_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: We've built safety into our platform. Here's how we help protect you:

IDENTITY_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Identity Verification
IDENTITY_VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Our ID verification confirms members are who they claim to be.

VIRTUAL_PHONE.TITLE: Virtual Phone Numbers
VIRTUAL_PHONE.DESCRIPTION: Premium members can share a number without revealing their real one.

BLOCKING.TITLE: Easy Blocking
BLOCKING.DESCRIPTION: Block anyone instantly. They can't contact you or see your profile.

REPORT.TITLE: Report Function
REPORT.DESCRIPTION: Report concerning behavior directly from profiles or conversations.

PRIVATE_PHOTOS.TITLE: Private Photos
PRIVATE_PHOTOS.DESCRIPTION: Control who sees your private photos with approval-based access.

TRUST_SCORE.TITLE: Trust Score
TRUST_SCORE.DESCRIPTION: See at a glance how complete and verified someone's profile is.

RESOURCES_SECTION.LABEL: Get Help
RESOURCES_SECTION.TITLE: Safety Resources
RESOURCES_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: If you're in an unsafe situation or need support, these resources can help.
RESOURCES_SECTION.EMERGENCY: In an emergency, call 911 (or your local emergency number) immediately.

REPORT_SECTION.TITLE: Report a Concern
REPORT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: If you've experienced harassment, abuse, or any concerning behavior on Gylde, please report it. Your reports help us keep the community safe.

IN_APP.TITLE: In the App
IN_APP.DESCRIPTION: Use the report button on any profile or conversation

HERO.TITLE: Community Guidelines
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Our community is built on respect, honesty, and genuine connection. These guidelines help us maintain a safe and welcoming environment for everyone.

INTRO.P1: Gylde is a community of individuals seeking meaningful connections. To ensure everyone has a positive experience, we ask all members to follow these guidelines. Violations may result in warnings, temporary suspension, or permanent removal from the platform.

AUTHENTICITY.TITLE: Authenticity
AUTHENTICITY.DESCRIPTION: Be genuine. Use real photos. Share honest information about yourself.

RESPECT.TITLE: Respect
RESPECT.DESCRIPTION: Treat every member with dignity, regardless of whether you're interested in them.

INTEGRITY.TITLE: Integrity
INTEGRITY.DESCRIPTION: Be clear about your intentions. Don't mislead or manipulate others.

SAFETY.TITLE: Safety
SAFETY.DESCRIPTION: Protect yourself and others. Report concerning behavior promptly.

DO.D1: Use recent photos that accurately represent how you look today
DO.D2: Provide truthful information about your age, location, and relationship status
DO.D3: Be honest about your intentions and what you're looking for
DO.D4: Complete identity verification to build trust
DO.D5: Update your profile if your circumstances change

DONT.D1: Use photos of other people or heavily filtered/edited images
DONT.D2: Create fake profiles or impersonate others
DONT.D3: Misrepresent your identity, profession, or lifestyle
DONT.D5: Use the platform if you're not legally eligible (under 18)

DO.D1: Communicate politely, even when declining interest
DO.D4: Appreciate that everyone has different preferences

DONT.D1: Send unsolicited explicit messages or photos
DONT.D2: Harass, bully, stalk, or intimidate anyone
DONT.D3: Use hateful, discriminatory, or offensive language
DONT.D4: Continue contacting someone who has blocked you or asked you to stop
DONT.D5: Shame or mock other users publicly or privately

LEGAL.TITLE: Keep It Legal

PROHIBITED.P1: Soliciting or offering prostitution or escort services
PROHIBITED.P2: Soliciting money, gifts, or financial support
PROHIBITED.P4: Human trafficking or exploitation of any kind
PROHIBITED.P6: Using Gylde for commercial purposes or advertising
PROHIBITED.P7: Attempting to hack, scrape, or compromise the platform

LEGAL.WARNING: We report illegal activity to law enforcement when required or appropriate.

DO.D1: Keep personal information private until you've built trust
DO.D2: Use our in-app messaging until you're comfortable sharing contact info
DO.D3: Report anyone who asks for sensitive information inappropriately
DO.D4: Respect that private photos require permission to view

DONT.D1: Share screenshots or content from private conversations publicly
DONT.D2: Share other users' personal information without consent
DONT.D3: Record video or voice calls without permission
DONT.D4: Create content featuring other users without their consent

CONTENT_STANDARDS.TITLE: Content Standards

PHOTO_MUST.D1: Clearly show your face (at least one photo)
PHOTO_MUST.D2: Be appropriate for all audiences in public areas
PHOTO_MUST.D3: Be photos you have the right to use
PHOTO_MUST.D4: Not contain contact information or social media handles

PROHIBITED.P1: Nudity or sexually explicit content in public profile areas
PROHIBITED.P4: Images of minors (children should not appear in your photos)

CONTENT_STANDARDS.NOTE: Private photos have more flexibility but still must not contain illegal content.

REPORTING.TITLE: Reporting Violations
REPORTING.P1: If you encounter behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it immediately. You can report users directly from their profile or conversation.

WHAT_HAPPENS.L1: Your report is reviewed by our Trust & Safety team
WHAT_HAPPENS.L2: The reported user is not notified who made the report
WHAT_HAPPENS.L3: Appropriate action is taken based on the severity of the violation
WHAT_HAPPENS.L4: Repeated or serious violations result in permanent bans

REPORTING.CONTACT_PREFIX: For urgent safety concerns, contact us directly at

CONSEQUENCES.TITLE: Consequences
CONSEQUENCES.P1: Violations of these guidelines result in action proportional to the offense:

WARNING.TITLE: Warning
WARNING.DESCRIPTION: Minor first-time violations may result in a warning and content removal.

SUSPENSION.TITLE: Temporary Suspension
SUSPENSION.DESCRIPTION: Repeated violations or moderate offenses may result in a temporary ban.

BAN.TITLE: Permanent Ban
BAN.DESCRIPTION: Serious violations or continued misbehavior result in permanent removal.

CONSEQUENCES.NOTE: Bans are typically not reversible. We take the safety of our community seriously.

CLOSING.TITLE: Thank You
CLOSING.P1: By following these guidelines, you help create a community where genuine connections can flourish. Thank you for being part of Gylde and treating fellow members with the respect they deserve.
CLOSING.P2_PREFIX: Questions about these guidelines? Contact us at

RESET.SUCCESS: Check your email for a password reset link.

DISABLED.TITLE: Account Disabled
DISABLED.INFO: Would you like to re-enable your account and restore your profile?

DISCOVER.EMPTY_SUBTITLE: Try adjusting your filters or check back later.

SAVE_VIEW.TITLE: Save Current View
SAVE_VIEW.DESCRIPTION: Give your filter settings a name so you can quickly apply them later.

MANAGE_VIEWS.TITLE: Saved Views
MANAGE_VIEWS.EMPTY_DESCRIPTION: Save your current filters to quickly apply them later

EMPTY.NO_MATCHES: You don't have any matches yet. When someone you favorite also favorites you, they'll appear here!
EMPTY.NO_FAVORITES_RECEIVED: No one has favorited you yet. Keep your profile active!
EMPTY.NO_VIEWS: No one has viewed your profile yet.
EMPTY.NO_FAVORITES_SENT: You haven't favorited anyone yet. Explore profiles to find your match!
EMPTY.NO_PROFILES_VIEWED: You haven't viewed any profiles yet.

MESSAGES.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You've received a message! Upgrade your plan to read and reply to messages.

RESTRICTION.DAILY_LIMIT_DESC: You've used all your messages for today. Your limit resets at midnight.
RESTRICTION.TIER_DESC: Build your reputation to unlock messaging with this user. Complete your profile and verify your identity to get started.
RESTRICTION.BLOCKED_DESC: You cannot exchange messages with this user.
RESTRICTION.DEFAULT_DESC: Unable to send messages at this time.

CHAT_INPUT.BLOCKED_NOTICE: You cannot send messages to this user

VIRTUAL_PHONE.LABEL: Your Private Number
VIRTUAL_PHONE.NEEDS_VERIFICATION: Verify your phone number first to get a private number for sharing with connections
VIRTUAL_PHONE.COMING_SOON_DESC: Share a number with connections without revealing your real one

PROFILE.TITLE: My Profile
PROFILE.REPUTATION_DESCRIPTION: Your reputation reflects your behavior on the platform. Higher tiers unlock more reach to higher-tier members.
PROFILE.MESSAGING_GATE_HINT: Only members at this reputation tier or above can start new conversations with you.
PROFILE.PHOTOS_HINT: Click the star to set as profile photo. You can upload up to {{max}} photos.
PROFILE.US_ONLY_NOTICE: Gylde is currently available in the United States only.
PROFILE.SUPPORT_MEANING_PLACEHOLDER: What does support mean to you?

USER_PROFILE.ERROR_HINT: This profile may be private or no longer exists.

MESSAGE.TIER_REQUIREMENT: This member accepts messages from {{tier}} reputation and above.
MESSAGE.TIER_LIMIT_REACHED: You've reached your daily limit for starting conversations with {{tier}} members. Try again tomorrow or upgrade your reputation.
